item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Members:

It's been a while since we had our last meeting, I've been extremely busy with work. Everyone has been so patient, thank you.

I am pleased to announce the April 2008 Boston Karaoke Meetup!

Please join us if you can. You will have a great time.

I look forward to seeing all of you again.

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Boston Karaoke Meetup at the Door
item.why: You'll meet some great people and have a good time...
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - April 5th 2008
